Context:
The Library Learning Commons at George Brown College has implemented changes to their LLC Laptop Loan Policy on December 18, 2023. This information can be found on Library News & Services.

The library aims to make all learning materials and services accessible for individuals with disabilities or those who are Deaf, deafened, and hard of hearing. They encourage users to inform library staff of any accessibility barriers they encounter and suggest ways to improve the library services. Contact information includes: phone number (416-415-2000), TTY (1-877-515-5559), email (ask.george@georgebrown.ca), or chat.

Additionally, visitors can sign up to receive updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more by clicking "Sign Up Now." The George Brown College website contains information that is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying the college's fee requirements.

Accessibility links:
- Learn more about the college's land acknowledgment
- Sign Up Now

Contact details:
- Phone: 416-415-2000
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
